mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_CODE, USER_SEX, USER_ADDRESS, USER_TEL, CREATE_TIME, NOTE from t_user where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_CODE, USER_SEX, USER_ADDRESS, USER_TEL, CREATE_TIME, NOTE) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,javaType=com.jixs.mybatis.typehandler.SexEnum,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_user set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,javaType=com.jixs.mybatis.typehandler.SexEnum,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TEL = #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
